entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bella Coola
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Coola Airport 11:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure: 104.3 kPa
Humidity: 33 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 3.
